testcase.name: Verify whether the user can use edit functionality to edit dates
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User enter username and password.......................................passed Then User clicks on login button............................................passed And User is redirected to dashboard.........................................passed And User navigates to posts section.........................................passed Then User is redirected to Posts section....................................passed When User clicks on the post"<good>"........................................passed And User clicks on publish immediately"<edit>"..............................passed Then User clicks on date dropdown...........................................passed And User selects 06-June option"<06-June>"..................................passed Then User clicks on publish button in edit functionality to update date.....passed Then User clicks on update button in edit functionality to update the changes.passed
